trips.name: Explore Volcanoes and Scenic Parks
trips.description: Immerse yourself in Manila’s vibrant luxury and culture, then escape to Batangas’ serene beauty.

trips.name: Tulum to Cancun: Riviera Adventure
trips.description: Discover the best of Tulum and Cancun, from ancient Mayan ruins and turquoise cenotes to the vibrant nightlife of the Hotel Zone.

trips.name: Miami Beach Getaway
trips.description: Enjoy Miami's sun-kissed beaches, explore the art deco architecture of South Beach, and indulge in world-class dining and nightlife.

trips.name: Las Vegas Luxury Escape
trips.description: Experience the glitz and glamour of Las Vegas with VIP access to shows, exclusive dining, and luxurious hotel stays on the Strip.
